name: GONIC - NO,MORE 2
description:
Finally Gonic No, More 2 has been released!

After long work its finally done, you can play it!

Gonic No,More 2 have really difficult levels but not impossible.

Gonic is in prison because of Hoddog who also kidnapped your princess..

So you must get out of prison ,complete all 16 levels witch is a long adventure! Get over Hills of Pain, Cave of Ketchup, Hot Sand and last one Glitch for Life!

Who is GONIC?

Gonic is a parody of Sonic.

Blue autistic hedgehog with wierd eyes.
